body: So... they'll restore the missing stuff? DAMN I REMOVED THE 404's FROM MY FAVS.
guys good news, it is not closed yet. The boss is apparently have some problems on software and co workers. you can see it on his twitter
ALOT of the most favorites got a 404 shits being taken out! im glad i hurried!
Thearrowofgod Take it easy my friend, you don't need to hurry. If you want collect these books, why not going nyaa torrent or tokyotoshokan?
filled up a 4gig flash drive notice alot of favorites got a 404 follow my lead gents!
I got out my flash drive, fired up bitorent, now i'm downloading everything in my favorites before this site goes down or I get a 404 like the others.
star_killer stay strong dude... I will stay here for a week or so, after that i am officialy done.
they still seem to at least have  the wani archived because i can still see them in my favorites

How was wani even able to contact them to request a dmca take down, i knew it was probably coming because the site is no where near the obscure jem that it was a few months ago. since it got so popular it was only a matter of time until it happened but i am still bummed because i thought that this site wouldn't take them down no matter what (http://nhentai.net/dmca/), i guess this just goes to show that there  is just fuck all that you can do when threatened with legal action.
gotta agree with nitesoulzero. this is indeed one of the best sites ive come across too, and trust me ive seen many h sites
I'm agree that this site is the best organize manga collection in my 10 years experience. I'm still hope for they comeback.......
How about just wait until new update come? the lastest book uploaded just 3 days ago. It's not month or week, so we must wait.
I'll be SO bummed if I lose my favorites. It's a treasure chest that I'll only find here.
g.e-hentai never seems to fail at least. still this website is prime.

Usually I don't worry about this kind of stuff when uploads seem to cease for awhile since there could be any kind of reasoning behind it the fact that there haven't been uploads doesn't  necessarily mean the site is dead maou and his small staff could be doing anything behind the scenes. With that being said I am a little worried now the reason being that his twitter has been very quite lately not only that but now it seems some galleries are being removed which might be a bad sign I really hope this isn't the case because in my opinion this is the best h-site I have ever come across and has been a suitable replacement to pururin and hope it lives on forever. Maou please give us some kind of update so we know you haven't abandoned us
maou, you promised a land free of DMCA, WHAT THE FUCK HAPPENED?
Damn, I didn't wanna go back to FAKKU!
Wani stuff deleted, this is the end
i know right !! Why the big pause after every update, last time it was a few days long !!!??
